Skip to contents
wcsap 1.0
  • Reference
    • Stock assessment prioritization for West Coast groundfish

Package index

All functions

all_species()
Common species name in a matrix form. This approach can result in issues in identifying species. Needs to be improved in order to create search groups for complex species.
calculate_rank()
Calculate the assessment prioritization rank by species based upon all the factors.
calculate_ties()
Calculate tiess within ranks.
clean_model_files()
Function to delete extraneous Stock Synthesis files. This function only deletes extra Stock Synthesis files to reduce the number of files for each assessment. Not necessary to run to read or summarize model results.
create_calender()
Create a calender
filter_gemm()
Filter the GEMM data
filter_revenue()
Filter out and identify tribal and non-tribal records
filter_years()
Filter data by year
format_all()
Do all final formatting
format_species_names()
Standardize species names
format_table()
Combine management group to tables based on species names
get_species_codes()
Return PacFIN species codes
move_files_to_sap()
Copy and move csv file by factor to the shiny repo
summarize_const_demand()
Calculations used for the "Const Demand" tab for assessment prioritization.
summarize_ecosystem()
Calculate ecosystem rank based upon Atlantis/Ecosim output
summarize_fishing_mortality()
Comparison between recent average mortality, OFLs, and ACLs.
summarize_frequency()
Function to create the full assessment frequency tab.
summarize_future_spex()
Function to compare future ACLs to existing fishing mortality averages.
summarize_new_information()
Calculate score based upon new information and research
summarize_rebuilding()
Calculate score based upon rebuilding
summarize_rec_importance()
Calculate recreational importance
summarize_revenue()
Calculate importance by revenue
summarize_stock_status()
Calculate ranking by stock status
